name: KIC InnoEnergy SE
goal:
KIC InnoEnergy's objectives are three:
First, decrease of costs of energy
Second, decrease greenhouse gas emissions
Third, increase the security/operability of the energy system

KIC InnoEnergy is a European consortium acting as a catalyser of innovation in the field of sustainable energy by promoting innovation, entrepreneurship and education. It supports innovation projects, provides acceleration services to start-ups and ventures, and organizes Master’s and PhD educational programmes.

KIC InnoEnergy supports and invests in innovation at every stage of the journey – from classroom to customers. With its network of partners it builds connections across Europe, bringing together inventors and industry, entrepreneurs and markets, graduates and employers, researchers and businesses

KIC InnoEnergy counts 28 key institutions in the energy field as shareholders (top European industry players, universities, and research centers) and over 100 additional partners.
